catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Modena, Leone
description: Contents: Ptolemy, Maʿaśeh keli ha-habaṭah (Treatise on the astrolabe) (ff. 1v-2v). Luḥot (f. 3). Tekhunat ha-kadur (ff. 4r-13v). Josef Ṭaṭtsiḳ, La-ʿaśot ha-atsṭrolabe (ff. 14v-17r). Jacob ben Machir Ibn Tibbon, Rovaʿ Yiśraʾel ("Israel's Quadrant", chapter 16) (f. 18v). Leone Modena, Sefer ben David (ff. 19r-24r). Simon Calimani, Ḳol Śimḥa (ff. 26-34).
